title: Fix robot animation lag and disable continuous rotation

requirements.text: Optimize robot animation speed and responsiveness in RobotModel.tsx to eliminate lag and slowness during all gesture-triggered movements (jump, rotate, raise hands, wave, move backward, clap, move forward)

quotes: the robot is lagging the motion by being slow fix this

acceptanceCriteria: All gesture-triggered animations execute immediately without noticeable delay
Animation transitions complete smoothly within 0.5-1 second
No frame drops or stuttering during animation playback
Robot responds to gesture changes in real-time

requirements.text: Remove the continuous autonomous rotation animation from RobotModel.tsx so the robot only rotates when the index+middle fingers up gesture is actively detected

quotes: the robot need not rotate full time it should rotate when the required hand gesture is given for rotate instruction

acceptanceCriteria: Robot remains stationary when no gesture is detected
Robot only rotates when index+middle fingers gesture is recognized
Rotation starts immediately upon gesture detection
Rotation stops when gesture is no longer detected or completes its animation cycle

constraints: Do not modify gesture recognition logic in useHandDetection.ts or gestureRecognizer.ts
Maintain the existing gesture-to-animation mapping for index+middle fingers triggering rotation
Keep all existing animations (jump, clap, wave, move, raise hands) functioning as currently implemented
nonGoals: Changing the 3D robot model or its visual appearance
Modifying gesture detection accuracy or threshold values
